page.title: 13GOFFEEE THE CLOWN,LYDART
page.content: I am a clown,The Great Goffeee (red nose and big feet),alias Harry le Goff (white nose and no money),alias Prof. Goffeee (the Punch & Judy man). I was originally trained as an artist and my paintings of circus and fair-ground life eventually led me to performing. I started as a clown in Gerry Cottle's Circus in l976.I moved to the Monmouth area in 1977,and now live in a small cottage with my wife,the painter Sarah Allpress,and our two children. Since 1976 I have had my own shows ranging from Punch and Judy and clown shows on Tenby beach,to shows touring rural communities. I now have my own small circus seating 250 in a little Big Top - Circus Dda. It is a new style circus combining good clowning and circus skills with experimental theatre and music.
